snippet.title: MULTIPLAYER real-time house building - Vivaland
snippet.description:
Build cottage houses or dream mansions in REAL-TIME with your friends in our upcoming MULTIPLAYER life simulation game: Vivaland! Change the colors of objects, use curved walls and forget the grid forever! 🏡

VIVALAND is the first simulation game built with multiplayer in mind from the ground up. Every household in Vivaland is controlled by real players around the world!

🟣 Discord community: log in for the insider info & chat with us here!
https://discord.gg/BSyuvfP5rP

⚪ Add the game to your Steam wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1976830/Vivaland/

🟠 Support the development on Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/vivaland

🔵 Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates!
https://twitter.com/vivalandgame

🔴 Tiktok for creative content:
https://www.tiktok.com/@vivalandgame

⚫Check out our website!
https://vivalandgame.com/
